message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. I am willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $135.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still interested in purchasing the product, and I would like to counter your offer at $120.
I understand you're sticking to your initial offer, Bob. I'm willing to compromise a bit more. I'll offer it to you for $132.50, but I think that's as low as I can go.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to reach a fair price. I would like to counter your offer at $125.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll meet you at $129, but I'm not going any lower than that.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offers. I would like to counter your offer at $127.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll meet you at $128, but I'm not going any lower than that. This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your final offer. I would like to counter your offer at $126.
